content: As an AI language model, I do not have an opinion, but different forms of digital marketing tools work better for different types of businesses, target markets, and objectives. However, for a new business, a combination of SEO, social media marketing and content marketing can be effective to build brand awareness, attract new customers and generate leads. It is essential to create great content that resonates with the target audience and is optimized for search engines. Social media marketing can be leveraged to distribute the content and increase visibility. Once a new business has established an online presence, they can evaluate which other forms of digital marketing tools will be most effective for their business goals.
